Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.LivingRoom

Class LivingRoom

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.LivingRoom.LivingRoom
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class LivingRoom extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents the living room of the game, a class that contains the central grid, the card generator and the extracted commonGoalCard.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • LivingRoom

      public LivingRoom(int numPlayers, int numCommonGoalCards, CardGenerator cardGenerator) throws IOException
      Constructor: Build the central grid and generates the common goal cards.
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - The number of players that will use the living room
      numCommonGoalCards - The number of common goal cards
      cardGenerator - is the card to be use to generate living room cards
      Throws:
      IOException

  • Method Details

    • consumeCentralPoints

      public int consumeCentralPoints()
      Its used when the first library of the game is filled with object cards. This method consumes the central score card and returns the amount of points.
      Returns:
      amount of points in the central score card

    • getGrid

      public Grid getGrid()
      It returns the grid of the game (not the copy, the original)
      Returns:
      The grid object in the living room

    • getCentralScorePoints

      public int getCentralScorePoints()
      It returns central point score
      Returns:
      the amount of point available at the center of the living room

    • getCommonGoalCards

      public CommonGoalCard[] getCommonGoalCards()
      It returns a vector of common goal card
      Returns:
      the array of common goal cards in the library
